content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Used to smelt iron ore into iron plates. This furnace is employed to boost the available iron plates through smelting processes (iron ore and coal are inserted to produce additional iron plates).

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Used for smelting copper ore into copper plates. The furnace processes harvested copper ore (with coal) to yield copper plates needed for further production.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Usage Errors  
  – When calling get_entities(), use only the supported argument types. Avoid providing unexpected keyword parameters (like “radius”) or excessive positional arguments to prevent TypeError exceptions.

• Lab Placement and Iteration Errors  
  – Confirm that a Lab is present in inventory before attempting placement. Validate returned entity collections (ensuring they are not None) before iterating, to avoid “NoneType” iteration errors.

• Lab Crafting Prerequisite Errors  
  – Ensure all required sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables) are available prior to attempting to craft a Lab. Establish and verify proper smelting and resource production processes so that complex items can be crafted without missing prerequisites.
